climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: ✦360° Chin/Neck/Head Support✦ Adult size for neck size 12.5" and above. Small size for neck size up to 12.5". The patented ergonomic travel pillow, with unique triple support, prevents the head from falling forward. The Q-shaped design provides 360 degrees of good support to the head, neck, and chin, relieving neck pain when sitting in an airplane, car, office, and home. You can turn the pillow 90 degrees to get elevated side comfort.

✦Unique Finds✦ The original design provides comfort in any sleeping position to sleep better than ever in airplanes, cars, trains, and buses. You can also wear it on the sofa/chairs while reading or watching TV at home or working in the office. You can easily adjust it to your comfort by keeping your head in an upright position that relaxes neck muscles. Great idea to travel or home as a gift for friends and lovers who will love it.

✦Travel Kit✦ Come with 3D contoured sleep mask earplugs. It helps you take a good nap. The travel bag keeps the pillow clean and stored. We specially designed a built-in pocket on the side of the neck pillow, when not using them, you can put the eye mask and earplugs into the pocket.
✦Easy to Carry & Machine Washable✦ It attaches to the Luggage and Backpack with a Snap Strap, so it is easy to go with you; The entire pillow can be machine washed and let air dry.

✦Materials & Satisfaction Guarentee✦ Super soft micro-velvet, mostly used in intimate apparel, brings soft touch. Filled with enough three-dimensional PP cotton, the pillow offers better support. We focus on quality control and care about our customer’s shopping experience. If you have any issues, please feel free to contact us. We promise to give a satisfactory solution in time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars An Absolute Travel Must
reviews.reviewText: I have never been a neck pillow person but since I would be on flights that were 10+ hours long I thought it was time to invest. I am usually a side sleeper, so I felt that this style of pillow would bring me the most comfort. I was completely correct! One of the best parts about this pillow is that you can adjust the level of support. It was comfortable around my neck as a standard neck pillow, used to simulate side sleeping, and even as lumbar support. It was ready for use straight out of the bag with no strange packaging smell and it has stayed completely intact after going through the wash. I would highly recommend purchasing this neck pillow and I do not have any complaints or suggestions for improvements. It's perfect!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: First I have a short fat little neck and I don't like things around it, but for some reason this doesn't bother or make me feel claustrophobic. You can loosen and tighten to your comfort level, as well as turn the larger part to where you want more support. It is comfortable and supports the neck very well. The pillow itself comes with a snap so you can attach it to your luggage or whatever you're carrying . It also comes in a travel bag , which I think most people would prefer to keep it in and protected . I wish they would have put the snap on the travel bag as well. One can easily use the drawstrings to attach it wherever. Finally after going through a dozen travel pillows this is the one that I will be buying again and again. Great gift for the traveler in your life. Wish they had different colors but what they offer is sufficient for most. I highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I've tried many pillows. This is by far the best, and only 1 I actually use and fall asleep with.(I gave it a four because I feel like there's always room for improvement with these types of things). Because It's adjustable, I'm able to shape it to my sleeping situation. It's super soft and has a snap on it, which can be used to Hook it to a bag while walking through the airport. It's also super squishy if you want to just smash it into a backpack. I actually fell asleep w it on my last flight- and I have a lot of probs getting comfy on planes. This helps. Would buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars More sturdy than other pillows
reviews.reviewText: Very comfortable for traveling! Keeps your neck in better alignment than other travel pillows. Very soft. If you have a tiny neck and pull it too tight the button will pop when you adjust it, but overall great product, worth the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very comfortable and supportive
reviews.reviewText: I used this neck pillow for the first time on a 10 hour flight and it's the first neck pillow that I've used that actually provided enough support to allow me to sleep. It's very comfortable and I like that it has a carrying case. It is bulkier than other neck pillows but worth it. I highly recommend this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Bulky For Using on a Plane
reviews.reviewText: This neck pillow is quite large and bulky. It is large enough to qualify as a "carry-on" due to its large size, even when in the bag provided. It was comfortable enough but the size large outweighs the comfort. I would recommend for comfort but not overall for size and convenience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I like that I could share this travel pillow with my spouse. It was big enough for me but was able to let them use half to rest on also. It is a little bigger than most travel pillows but works great and is very soft. Not hot to wear around in the airport, like Cancun, easy to fold up, or adjust to the space I was in at the time. It did go in my carry on easy, or I could strap it to my bag when I was not using it and move around.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
